item.title: Azure Event Hubs 'Role Based Access Control' in action
item.description: Azure Event Hubs is streaming platform and event ingestion service that can receive and process millions of events per second. In this blog, we are going to cover one of the security aspects related to Azure Event Hubs.

item.title: Tip: Using the latest TLS version with Azure Cache for Redis
item.description: Azure Cache for Redis provides an in-memory data store based on the open-source software Redis. As a part of the industry-wide push toward the exclusive use of Transport Layer Security (TLS) version 1.
